des:
Severe weather, floods, tornados, wildfires, earthquakes, biohazards and other disastrous events and hazards threaten our safety in Canada more than ever.
 
Use the Alertable skill to keep you up to date for the Canadian locations you have chosen to be alerted for.
 
To get started, say “Alexa, open Alertable”, follow the start-up steps.
 
Flashing notification ring on your device? Check to see if it is from Alertable by saying, “Alexa, what are my notifications?”. If it is, then say “Alexa, tell Alertable to check my alerts”.
 
Fully customize your experience by trying the following:
 
Modify your alert locations
· “Alexa, tell Alertable to list my locations”
· “Alexa, tell Alertable to add an alert location”
· “Alexa, tell Alertable to remove an alert location”
· “Alexa, tell Alertable to add Toronto to my locations”
· “Alexa, tell Alertable to remove Toronto from my locations”
 
Modify the type of alerts you receive
· “Alexa, tell Alertable to change alert types”
· “Alexa, tell Alertable to add snowfall alerts”
· “Alexa, tell Alertable to stop snowfall alerts”
· “Alexa, tell Alertable to reset alert types”
 
Want to start from scratch with the Alertable skill and clear everything?
· “Alexa, tell Alertable to reset device settings”

We’re working on adding new features, so if you have any comments, we’d love to hear from you! You can reach us at info@peasi.com
